001package gbw.melange.common.shading.constants;
002
003public enum Vec2DistFunc {
004
005    MANHATTAN("abs(pointA.x - pointB.x) + abs(pointA.y - pointB.y);"),
006    EUCLIDEAN("sqrt(pow(pointA.x - pointB.x, 2.0) + pow(pointA.y - pointB.y, 2.0));"),
007    /**
008     * More performant as it avoids ever having to use sqrt
009     */
010    EUCLIDEAN_SQUARED("pow(pointA.x - pointB.x, 2.0) + pow(pointA.y - pointB.y, 2.0);"),
011    CHEBYSHEV("max(abs(pointA.x - pointB.x), abs(pointA.y - pointB.y));"),
012    MINKOWSKI_P3("pow(pow(abs(pointA.x - pointB.x), 3.0) + pow(abs(pointA.y - pointB.y), 3.0), 1.0 / 3.0);");
013
014    public final String glslCode;
015    Vec2DistFunc(String glslCode){
016        this.glslCode = glslCode;
017    }
018}
